short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your privacy from GIF trackers. Strip data parameters from GIF requests and send them through DuckDuckGo proxy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent privacy-invasive mostly 1x1 hidden GIF pixels that collect your personal data by stripping parameters and using DuckDuckGo proxy.
